main.name: Hemant Kuruva
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe JavaScript.
main.additional: And yes, I clicked that pic --->
main.bio: Hi there! I am Hemant! I've been coding for over 10 years now since my high school. I am a passionate coder with 1.5 years of professional experience in design and development of websites and web applications. With the experience of working for a large corporation, a startup, and as a freelance web developer, I am armed with an extensive understanding of SDLC on various levels in JavaScript ecosystem with special focus on MERN stack.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me by filling this form!

education.degree: Master of Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering

education.school: G. Pullaiah Colege of Engg. and Tech., Kurnool, AP, India

description.exp: Developed software for an IoT solution “Connected Retail 360” aimed at bringing online shopping experience to physical stores based on Azure IoT Best Practices. Responsible for architecting the project, DPS, developing the React-based Web Dashboard, building C/C++ software for IoT devices and tracking the project

description.projname: Performance Engineering Project for Black Friday for an eCommerce business
description.exp: Worked on a Performance Engineering and Testing project for a major Canadian eCommerce Business. Responsible for developing jMeter scripts in Java based Groovy language, troubleshooting and monitoring project progress &c.

Worked as a Senior Developer as well as Front-End Developer for an NY-based startup, MC Master of Ceremony, aimed at developing a smartphone application/platform for artists to collaborate and compete. Worked in an Agile Environment in a pure startup culture with responsibilities involving code reviews through pull requests on CodeCommit, task assignments on Jira and documentation on Confluence, research on the technology trends &c. On the development side, my main contribution has been the development of Admin Dashboard part of the platform which was based on React hosted on AWS while I also got exposed to native app development on React Native as a code reviewe
Taught C/C++ to students of 12-17 age, programmed robots based on Arduino platform, developed games based on Python, OpenCV &c.
